roleset.name: expand or contract rhythmically
roleset.note: PULSATE-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena. (from pulsate.01-v)

example.text: The lights pulsate until dawn no matter the reason.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: I know no weariness of my Edward's society; he knows none of mine, any more than we each do the pulsation of the heart that beats in our separate bosoms.
example.arg: of the heart that beats in our separate bosoms
